## How to apply for a license for Restaurant? **Step 1:** Refer to How to apply for license /registration manual for creating a license/registration **Step 2**: Click on License/Registration and Apply for License/Registration on the yellow Menu box. Image /page/0/Figure/3 description: The image shows a screen capture of a form for entering an application reference number and captcha code. The form includes fields for "Enter Application Reference No." and "Enter Captcha Code," along with a captcha image displaying the code "808846." A "Submit" button is located below the captcha. The text on the right side of the form states that filling the application for registration is easier through the app and encourages users to download the 'Food Safety Connect' app by scanning the QR code provided. Below the form, there are five rectangular boxes with different colors and icons, each representing a different function: Apply License/Registration, Modification of License and Registration, Renewals Fee, Food Consumer Grievance, and File Express Annual Return. **Step 3**: Select the State and Read the Note before proceeding. Image /page/0/Picture/5 description: The image shows a section of a form with the title "Select Kind of Business." Below the title, there is a note in a box that says, "Select the state where premises is located for which License/Registration will be obtained." There is a dropdown menu labeled "Select State." The note continues with additional information about licenses for multiple locations and the requirement for a Food Business Operator (FBO) to have only one FSSAI License or Registration. **Step 4**: Read the Group Heads of Kind of Business. Select Restaurant from food services Business Group Head. Image /page/1/Figure/0 description: The image shows a horizontal diagram with five stages: Manufacturer, Trade/Retail, Food Services, Central Govt. Agencies, and Head Office. The stages are represented by rectangular boxes with angled bottom edges, connected by colored lines. The line connecting Manufacturer and Trade/Retail is green to blue, the line connecting Trade/Retail and Food Services is blue, the line connecting Food Services and Central Govt. Agencies is red, and the line connecting Central Govt. Agencies and Head Office is blue to green. There are three black dots below the Food Services stage. Businesses involved in food activities related to preparation and serving of fresh food and drinks. | Petty Retailer of snacks/tea shops | | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--| | Hawker (Itinerant / Mobile food vendor) | | | Restaurants | | | Restaurant is a type of food service operation which prepares, serves food and drinks to customers in exchange for money. Image /page/1/Picture/4 description: The image shows a green and blue graphic about restaurants. The graphic includes a brief description of what a restaurant is, stating that it is a type of food service operation that prepares and serves food and drinks to customers in exchange for money. It also mentions that meals are generally served and eaten on the premises, but many restaurants also offer take-out and food delivery services. The graphic also lists three turnover categories: greater than 20 crores, up to 20 crores, and up to 12 lakhs/annum. **Step 6**: Fill in all the mandatory fields as shown in Form B. Please fill the communication details with caution as all the communication made by the authority will be done to the mentioned contact details viz Mobile No. or Email Id etc. Fill Application Details ### Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) on Instant License and Registration

### Q.1 Which Kind of business can get benefit of Instant issuance scheme for FSSAI License/Registration in food businesses?

Ans: The scheme aims to enable instant grant of License/Registration for selected low-risk categories of food businesses through digital verification which means, when you apply for license or registration for Wholesaler, Distributor, Retailer, Transporter, Storage without Atmospheric Controlled + Cold, Importer, Food Vending Agencies, Direct Sellers, Merchant-Exporter, Petty Retailer of snacks/tea shops, & Hawker (Itinerant / Mobile food vendor) and who are not involved in food categories like Milk, Meat and Fish.

## Ĥ.२ नाæता/चाय कȧ दकु ानɉ और हॉकर के ͧलए उपयÈु त खाɮय उ×पाद Įेणी Èया है?

उ. यǑद खाɮय åयवसाय के वल ताजा पके /तैयार खाɮय पदाथɟ से संबंͬधत है, तो FPC 16 (तैयार खाɮय पदाथ) का चयन करना आव [ æयक है। इसके अǓतǐरÈत, यǑद खाɮय åयवसाय अÛय Įेͨणयɉ के पैक खाɮय पदाथɟ कȧ खदुरा ǒबĐȧ मɅ शाͧमल है, तो उसे उपयÈुत खाɮय Įेͨणयɉ का चयन करना होगा।

### Q.2 What is the appropriate Food Product Category for Petty Retailer of snacks/tea shops, & Hawker?

Ans: FPC 16 (Prepared Foods) is required to be selected in case the food business is dealing in only freshly cooked/prepared food. Further, in case the food business is involved in retailing/sale of packed food of other categories, he/she is required to select appropriate food categories.

Ĥ.३ Èया खदुरा, थोक, ͪवतरण, भंडारण, सीधे ͪवĐय, और खाɮय वɅͫडगं एजɅसी मɅ शाͧमल खाɮय åयवसाय मांस और मछलȣ उ×पादɉ के ͧलए त×काल लाइसɅस/रिजèĚȣकरण ĤाÜत कर सकते हɇ?

उ. खाɮय åयवसायɉ को खदुरा ͪवĐे ता, थोक åयापारȣ, ͪवतरक, भंडारण, डायरेÈट सेलर और खाɮय वɅͫडगं एजɅसी के ͧलए त×काल लाइसɅस/रिजèĚȣकरण के तहत मांस और मांस उ×पादɉ और मछलȣ और मछलȣ उ×पादɉ केåयापार कȧ अनुमǓत नहȣं है। इसके अǓतǐरÈत, Ěांसपोट[र के मामले मɅ, डये रȣ, मांस और मछलȣ उ×पादɉ के åयापार कȧ अनुमǓत त×काल लाइसɅस/रिजèĚȣकरण के तहत नहȣं है।

#### Q.3 Can Food Businesses involved in Retail, Wholesale, Distribution, Storage, Direct Selling, & Food Vending Agency can obtain instant license/registration for Meat & Fish Products?

Ans: Food Businesses dealing with Meat & Meat Products & Fish & Fish Products for categories like Retailer, Wholesaler, Distributor, Storage, Direct Seller, & Food Vending Agency are not allowed under instant license/registration.

Further, in case of transporter, dealing with Dairy, Meat & Fish Products is not allowed under instant License/Registration.

Ans: The instant license/registration can be applied through Food Safety Compliance System [FoSCoS – https://foscos.fssai.gov.in] which can also be accessed through Mobile phones. Food Businesses can seek help through FSSAI Helpline 1800112100 or helpdeskfoscos@fssai.gov.in

Ans: For Initial phase 28th June 2024 onwards: Only proprietor [single owner] type of food businesses is allowed for Instant issuance of license.

Ans. The applicants,

- Whose license /registration cancelled by the authorities in past three months.
- Who is not falling under the listed Kind of Businesses for Instant Issuance of License. Food Businesses who have obtained the license /registration under wrong Kind of Businesses or not as per eligibility criteria may be penalised under Section 61 of FSS Act, 2006, wherein any false declaration shall attract penalty up to Rs. 10 lakhs.

# **Declaration to be submitted along with the application for License / Registration**

*I/We declare that –*

- *I/We have read, understood and shall abide all provisions of FSS Act,2006 and Rules, Regulations made therein and orders issued from time to time applicable to declared food business.*
- *I/We have food safety plan for the food business activities mentioned in the application to ensure that articles of food satisfy the requirements of FSS Act 2006 and Rules and Regulations made thereunder.*
- *Our facility shall comply with the general hygiene and sanitary requirements as mentioned in the Schedule 4 of the FSS (Licensing and Registration of Food Businesses) Regulations, 2011.*
- *I/We shall abide with all conditions of License/Registration.*
- *I/We shall modify the License as and when our eligibility in the mentioned criteria changes.*
- *I/We shall be responsible for Permissions/No Objection Certificates from other Govt. bodies wherever required.*
- *In case of manufacturing, the endorsed products refer to products for which standards are prescribed as per FSS (Food Products and Additives) Regulations and FSS (Health Supplements, Nutraceuticals, Food for Special Dietary Use, for Special Medical Purpose, Functional Food and Novel Food) Regulations, 2016 and FSS (Approval for Non-Specific Food and Food Ingredients) Regulation, 2017 and FSS (Alcoholic Beverages) Regulation, 2018. Only products as per above mentioned FSS regulations are allowed to be manufactured. In case of proprietary food manufactured by us in our manufacturing facilities, I/we shall follow the FSS Act, 2006 and subsequent rules and regulations made their under and shall be fully responsible for the safety of proprietary food as mentioned in the form.*
- *In case of repacking of food articles, the food items shall be brought/transported to our unit under hygienic conditions with proper bulk packaging while maintaining the required special storage/transport conditions.*
- *I/We shall manufacture only those products which are endorsed in the license.*
- *I/We shall employ a technical person or a food safety supervisor for supervising the food business activities as mentioned under Condition of License.*

*I do hereby solemnly affirm and declare that all information and particulars furnished here by me are true and correct to the best of my knowledge.*

(Signature of the applicant/authorized signatory)

The user then needs to choose KOB and click on Proceed Button. ### ![](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/images/aboutflrs1.png)

Food Licensing & Registration System (FLRS) is an online application launched by Food Safety and Standards Authority of India to facilitate Food Business Operators (FBO) in India to apply
for License/Registration Certificate and track their applications during the course of processing. 3.0 is the latest version recently launched in September, 2014. FLRS is being used by
5 Regional offices and 2 Sub-Regional offices of FoSCoS and several State Governments [(click here](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/state-in-map.html) to view the list) for processing and generation of licenses/registration certificates.It is hosted on a secure data center at NIC and available 24\*7 to all the stakeholders.

FLRS allow FBO’s to check their premises eligibility according to the location or the activity being conducted on that premise. FLRS sends automatic alerts on email and sms to the FBOs at
different intervals to facilitate faster processing of applications and allowing the FBOs to maintain continuity of their licenses/registration certificates.


### ![](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/images/trace1.gif)

The person supervising the production process shall possess at least a degree in Science with Chemistry/Bio Chemistry/Food and Nutrition/ Microbiology or a degree or diploma in food technology/ Dairy technology/ dairy microbiology/ dairy chemistry/
dairy engineering/oil technology /veterinary science /hotel management & catering technology or any degree or diploma in any other discipline related to the specific requirements of the business from a recognized university or institute
or equivalent.

Central License | | New LicenseConversionRenewal of LicenseModification of License | | | --- | | | | | --- | | **Documents to be enclosed for New Application for License to Central Licensing**
**Authority**
01. Form-B Duly completed and signed (In Duplicate) by the Proprietor/Partner or
the Authorized Signatory

02. Blueprint/layout plan of the processing unit showing the dimensions in metres/square
metres and operation-wise area allocation (mandatory for manufacturing and
processing units only)
03. List of Directors/Partners/Proprietor/Executive Members of Society/Trust with
full address and contact details (mandatory for companies only)
04. Name and List of Equipments and Machinery along with the number, installed
capacity and horse power used (mandatory for manufacturing and processing
units only)
05. Photo I.D and address proof issued by Government authority of Proprietor/Partner/Director(s)/Authorised
Signatory. (optional)
06. List of food category desired to be manufactured. (In case of manufacturers)
07. Authority letter with name and address of responsible person nominated by the
manufacturer along with alternative responsible person indicating the powers
vested with them viz assisting the officers in inspections, collection of
samples, packing & dispatch. (for manufacturers / processors)
08. Analysis report (Chemical & Bacteriological) of water to be used as ingredient
in food from a recognized/ public health laboratory to confirm the portability
(mandatory only for manufacturing and processing units only)
09. Proof of possession of premises. (Sale deed/ Rent agreement/ Electricity bill,
etc.) (optional)

10. Partnership Deed/Self Declaration for Proprietorship   \[
[![pdf](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/images/adobe-pdf-icon.png) Download self-declaration for Proprietorship(pdf:178KB)](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/docs/SelfDeclarationforProprietorship%20.pdf)\]  /Memorandum & Articles of Association towards the constitution
of the firm. (optional) – For MoA - Three pages need to be uploaded (First
page - Certification of incorporation, Second page - Authorization of food
business activity and Third page - list of directors with addresses)
11. Copy of certificate obtained under Coop Act - 1861/Multi State Coop Act - 2002
in case of Cooperatives. (wherever applicable)
12. NOC & Copy of License from manufacturer (mandatory for relabellers and
repackers only) \[
[![pdf](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/images/adobe-pdf-icon.png)Download Declaration and Undertaking by FBO – Repackagers Only(pdf:562KB)](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/docs/DeclarationforFBO.pdf)\]
13. Food Safety Management System plan or certificate (if any)  \[
[![pdf](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/images/adobe-pdf-icon.png)Download self-declaration regarding FSMS(pdf:241KB)](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/docs/DeclarationRegardingFSMSPlan.pdf)\]
14. Source of milk or procurement plan for milk including location of milk collection
centres etc. in case of Milk and Milk Products processing units.(wherever
applicable)
15. Source of raw material for meat and meat processing plants. (wherever applicable)
16. Pesticide residues report of water in case of units manufacturing packaged
drinking water, packaged Mineral water and/or carbonated water from a recognised/
public health laboratory
17. Recall plan wherever applicable, with details on whom the product is distributed.
(optional)

18. NOCs from Municipality or local body. (optional)
19. Ministry of Commerce Certificate for 100% EOU
20. Supporting documentary proof for Turnover
21. NOC/PA document issued by FSSAI (In case of multiple documents, merge them
into one document and then upload)
22. IE CODE document issued by DGFT
23. Form IX: Nomination of Persons by a Company alongwith the Board Resolution.
 
[![pdf](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/images/adobe-pdf-icon.png)Click here to Download in English(pdf:169KB)](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/docs/FORM_IX.pdf) \|
[![pdf](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/images/adobe-pdf-icon.png)Click here to Download in Hindi(pdf:107KB)](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/docs/Form%20IX-%20Hindi.pdf)
24. Certificate provided by Ministry of Tourism (HRACC). (Mandatory for Hotel Only)
25. For Transporters-Supporting documentary proof for Turnover or self declaration
of number of vehicles (Mandatory for Transporter Only)
26. Declaration Form  
[![pdf](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/images/adobe-pdf-icon.png)Click here to Download in English(pdf:168KB)](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/docs/Declaration.pdf) \|
[![pdf](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/images/adobe-pdf-icon.png)Click here to Download in Hindi(pdf:102KB)](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/assets/docs/Declaration-Hindi.pdf) | | | The person supervising the production process shall possess at least a degree in Science with Chemistry/Bio Chemistry/Food and Nutrition/ Microbiology or a degree or diploma in food technology/ Dairy technology/ dairy microbiology/ dairy chemistry/ dairy engineering/oil technology /veterinary science /hotel management & catering technology or any degree or diploma in any other discipline related to the specific requirements of the business from a recognized university or institute or equivalent. ### **Fee Structure**

**Please Note:** License/Certificate can be applied for a maximum period of 5 Years.

|  | Central (1 Year) | State (1 Year) | Registration (1 Year) | Konkan/Indian Railway (1 Year) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| New Application | 7500 | [**View**](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/fee-state-license/NA) | 100 | 2000 |
| Renewal Application | 7500 | [**View**](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/fee-state-license/RA) | 100 | 2000 |
| License/Certificate Modification | 7500 | [**View**](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/fee-state-license/LM) | 100 | 2000 |
| Duplicate License/Certificate | 10% of the Applicable License Fee | [**View**](https://foscos.fssai.gov.in/fee-state-license/DL) | 10% of the Applicable Certificate Fee | 10% of the Applicable Certificate Fee |

The person supervising the production process shall possess at least a degree in Science with Chemistry/Bio Chemistry/Food and Nutrition/ Microbiology or a degree or diploma in food technology/ Dairy technology/ dairy microbiology/ dairy chemistry/
dairy engineering/oil technology /veterinary science /hotel management & catering technology or any degree or diploma in any other discipline related to the specific requirements of the business from a recognized university or institute
or equivalent.
